articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: West African militaries meet to finalise possible Niger intervention - Reuters
articles.description: West African army chiefs were due to hold a second and final day of talks on Friday in Ghana's capital Accra, where they have been hashing out the details of a possible military intervention in Niger if diplomacy fails to reverse a military coup.
articles.content: ACCRA/NIAMEY, Aug 18 (Reuters) - West African army chiefs were due to hold a second and final day of talks on Friday in Ghana's capital Accra, where they have been hashing out the details of a possib… [+1480 chars]

articles.author: Nathaniel Scharping
articles.title: Evidence of Earth's Oldest Glaciers Found in South Africa - Eos
articles.description: The ancient glaciers hint at an Archaean Earth that may have looked similar in some ways to our own time.
articles.content: Earth may have hosted glaciers as far back as 3 billion years ago, reports a new study published in Geochemical Perspectives Letters. Drawing on multiple lines of evidence from some of the oldest und… [+5063 chars]
